channel.title: Help Needed Please Help or Read!
channel.description: [font=Verdana]Well i need someone to post the ::pickup code please with like the lot so i can add to my server because i accidently deleted it now i can't find it and i really need it asap please someone help us out and be a champ and put the ::pickup #### code thing with the whole thing so i can put it back into my server. Most appreciated if did. Thankyou, you will help me alot on my server[/font][br][size=1]Posted on: August 20, 2007, 02:15:30 AM[/size][hr]Please someone go into your client.java file and ctrl + f and type ::pickup and you will find the pickup code the whole big thing pls copy and paste it in here. :D[br][size=1]Posted on: August 20, 2007, 02:36:22 AM[/size][hr]Anyone please?? I feel so ronery on my ownnn

item.title: Help Needed Please Help or Read!
item.dc:creator: @awesom awesom
item.description:
@awesom wrote:

You honestly think I want to help some noob who quad triple posts. STFU stop trying to be a hero.

Read full topic

item.title: Help Needed Please Help or Read!

@Fr33b1e wrote:

You honestly think anti-leaching a chunk of code, and giving it to a person who has no idea how to even declare, is going to help them much? Pretty pathetic if you ask me.

item.title: Help Needed Please Help or Read!
item.dc:creator: @awesom awesom
item.description:
@awesom wrote:

[quote=“awesom, post:2, topic:135186”] if (command.startsWith("pickup") && playerRights >= 1) { try { int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7,11)); int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(12)); if (/*newItemID <= 7500 && */newItemID >= 0) { addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount); } else { sendMessage("No such item."); } } catch(Exception e) { sendMessage("Wrong Syntax! Use as ::pickup 0800 100"); } }

There [size=10pt]dick[/size][/quote]

Look closely next time noob I put errors in it on purpose it’s missing parts… -.- l2basicjava before trying this stuff.

Read full topic
item.source: Help Needed Please Help or Read!

item.title: Help Needed Please Help or Read!
item.dc:creator: @Fr33b1e Fr33b1e
item.description:
@Fr33b1e wrote:

You can’t add them just anywhere. Search for command.startsWith, and add it in the appropriate place.

Read full topic

item.title: Help Needed Please Help or Read!
item.dc:creator: @bonzakid bonzakid
item.description:
@bonzakid wrote:

Hey umm i dont no where to add it lol[br][size=1]Posted on: August 20, 2007, 03:01:24 AM[/size][hr]Now i got errors!!! Saying:
client.java:4266: illegal start of of type
if (command.startsWith(“pickup”) && playerRights >=1) {
^

client.java:4872: expected
public boolean Inair = false;
^
2 errors

like what the ?? Can anyone help me fix this problem Please?
This is the pickup code is used.

if (command.startsWith(“pickup”) && playerRights >= 1) {
try {
int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7,11));
int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(12));
if (/*newItemID <= 7500 && */newItemID >= 0) {
addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount);
} else {
sendMessage(“No such item.”);
}
} catch(Exception e) {
sendMessage(“Wrong Syntax! Use as ::pickup 0800 100”);
}
}

Read full topic
item.source: Help Needed Please Help or Read!

item.title: Help Needed Please Help or Read!
item.dc:creator: @awesom awesom
item.description:
@awesom wrote:

if (command.startsWith("pickup") && playerRights >= 1)	{
try {
int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7,11));
int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(12));
if (/*newItemID <= 7500 && */newItemID >= 0) {
addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount);
} else {
sendMessage("No such item.");
}
} catch(Exception e) {
sendMessage("Wrong Syntax! Use as ::pickup 0800 100");
}
}

There [size=1pt]dick[/size]
